info.name: Jobbee API
info.description: **Jobbee API** is a RESTful backend API built with Node.js, designed to manage job listings, user accounts, authentication, and related features. It provides endpoints for job creation, retrieval, updating, and deletion, as well as user registration, login, role-based access control, and more, making it ideal for modern job board applications.

item.name: Jobs

request.description: Retrieves all job listings stored in the database.

request.description: Retrieves all jobs located within a specified distance (radius) from a given geographical point, based on latitude and longitude coordinates. Useful for location-based job filtering.
Deletes a specific job from the database using its unique ID. The user must be authenticated and authorized as the employer who created the job.
Updates the details of an existing job in the database using its unique ID. The user must be authenticated and must be the employer who originally posted the job.

request.description: Returns aggregated statistics related to a specific job topic, such as the number of jobs available, average positions, and salary trends. Useful for analytics and insights.
Apply to any job by uploading resume

item.description: All request related to jobs like: Create, Read, Update, Delete, Apply to jobs etc.

item.name: Authentication

request.description: Login User with email and password

header.value: token=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpZCI6IjY4NWUxNDg5NmZlNTEwODdkZjdhZWMxYSIsImlhdCI6MTc1MTA0OTY3OCwiZXhwIjoxNzUxNjU0NDc4fQ.ZkPaTz92Z_0Mi-wEg1kFA1hBfML6Ln_BQXyTGr4EwEU; Path=/; Expires=Fri, 04 Jul 2025 18:41:18 GMT; HttpOnly; SameSite=Strict

request.description: Register user with email, password, name and role. Encrypted Password will be save in database.

header.value: token=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpZCI6IjY4NWVmYTA5MWU1OTkyOGQ1MTYzMWM2YSIsImlhdCI6MTc1MTA1NDg1OCwiZXhwIjoxNzUxNjU5NjU4fQ.IW6gnerY5KQhfMwEgueFuK0xwsrqMLntEILNKvAYKw4; Path=/; Expires=Fri, 04 Jul 2025 20:07:38 GMT; HttpOnly; SameSite=Strict

request.description: Sends a password reset email to the user’s registered email address. The email contains a secure token with an expiration time, which can be used to reset the password.
Resets the password for a user account using a valid reset token. This route is typically accessed via the link sent to the user's email and allows the user to set a new password.

header.value: token=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpZCI6IjY4NWVmYTA5MWU1OTkyOGQ1MTYzMWM2YSIsImlhdCI6MTc1MTI0MDY1NCwiZXhwIjoxNzUxODQ1NDU0fQ.6bVha9hQFw9D-1eDjtSFz2vs5XimZLQ8q-bOdlqtDSI; Path=/; Expires=Sun, 06 Jul 2025 23:44:14 GMT; HttpOnly; SameSite=Strict

request.description: Logs the user out of the application by clearing the authentication token and expiring the associated cookie. This ensures the user session is securely terminated.

header.value: token=none; Path=/; Expires=Sun, 29 Jun 2025 23:46:35 GMT; HttpOnly

item.description: Includes all routes related to user authentication and account management, such as user registration, login, logout, password reset, and account recovery. These endpoints handle secure user access and identity verification.

item.name: Users

request.description: Retrieves the profile information of the currently authenticated user based on the active session or token. Useful for displaying user-specific data on dashboards or profile pages.

response.name: Get Current User Profile

request.description: Updates the authenticated user's profile details, such as name and email. The user must be logged in to perform this action.
Allows the authenticated user to update their password by providing the current password and a new one. Ensures secure password change for active sessions.

header.value: token=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpZCI6IjY4NWVmYTA5MWU1OTkyOGQ1MTYzMWM2YSIsImlhdCI6MTc1MTI0NDMwMSwiZXhwIjoxNzUxODQ5MTAxfQ.pixrjyGLwX2eRQdJlLHpvh5CWzyyG12TQ4TvAeIg3KY; Path=/; Expires=Mon, 07 Jul 2025 00:45:01 GMT; HttpOnly; SameSite=Strict

request.description: Permanently deletes the currently authenticated user from the database, along with all associated files and data. This action is irreversible and requires authentication.

header.value: token=none; Path=/; Expires=Mon, 30 Jun 2025 00:58:21 GMT; HttpOnly

item.name: Show All Jobs Applied By User

request.description: Retrieves a list of all jobs the currently authenticated user has applied to. Useful for tracking application history and status.

response.name: Show All Jobs Applied By User

request.description: Retrieves all jobs created by the currently authenticated employer or admin. Useful for managing and tracking posted job listings.

request.description: Allows an admin to permanently delete any user or employer from the database. This route is restricted to administrators only.
This request retrieves a list of all registered users in the system. It is accessible only by an Admin. The response includes user details such as ID, name, email, role, and registration date.

item.description: Includes all routes related to user management, such as retrieving user profiles, updating account information, changing passwords, and managing roles. These routes support both general users and administrators.
